title: Introduction to DevOps and CICD
description: This article explains what DevOps and CICD are. DevOps is a culture, movement, or practice that focuses on communication and collaboration between software developers and IT operations staff to automate the process of software delivery and architectural change. It is a set of best practices for improving software delivery around the entire software development lifecycle. CICD is an implementation of the DevOps culture that enables applications to move forward in a pipeline from code check-in, testing, build, and deployment through production. It allows organizations to partially or fully automate the delivery process, reducing communication costs and the cost of errors.
